title: shortfilm - "Woman!" (actioncomedy) [mpeg]
description:
---ENGLISH-------------------------------------------------------------------------
"kvinna!" is a shortfilm I made in 2 days in the winter of 2004.
The best thing is to not know what the movie is about when you see it so I will take the "spoiler"-oriented text at the end of this info.

Won "Honorbale Mention" in the "23rd International Film Festival "Up to 21" 2005".

TITLE: Kvinna! / Woman!
DIRECTOR & SCRIPT: Tim Drougge
FEATURING: Erik Dalin | Tim Man
DURATION: 4.15 / 6:18 (with credits)
LANGUAGE: none

STORY: A man wants to suprise his girlfriend with a nice dinner when the doorbell suddently rings.

--- / SPOILER  ---

This movie is one in a series of projects to try to do quality martial-arts actionmovies on a lowbudget level and in a country like Sweden. Erik Dalin and Tim Man who star in the movie are both proffesional trained stuntmen in Sweden and exellent martial artists. I have worked with Erik two times prior to this and one after on other peoples productions as a choregrapher or "beating bag. 

I love Feedback and suggestions for further productions so bring it on if you got it. I am at the moment working on the next actionmovie with Erik and Tim thats gonna include a new type of action with Parkour(city acrobatics), martial arts, magic/visual effects and yes dialoge driven story.

---SVENSKA-------------------------------------------------------------------------
"kvinna!" &auml;r en kortfilm som jag gjorde p&aring; 2 dagar f&ouml;rra vintern 2004.
Personligen tycker jag att upplevelsen &auml;r b&auml;st om man bara ser filmen, s&aring; jag kommer l&auml;mna infotexten som kan vara lite "spoiler"-orienterad tills slutet p&aring; den h&auml;r infon.

Vann "Honorbale Mention" p&aring; "23rd International Film Festival "Up to 21" 2005".

TITEL: Kvinna!
REGI & MANUS: Tim Drougge
MEDVERKANDE: Erik Dalin | Tim Man
L&Auml;NGD: 4.15 / 6:18 (med eftertexter)
SPR&Aring;K: inget

--- / SPOILER  ---

Den h&auml;r filmen &auml;r en i en serie av projekt som &auml;mnar att g&ouml;ra bra kampartsaktiga actionfilmer p&aring; en l&aring;g budget och i ett land som Sverige. Erik Dalin och Tim Man &auml;r b&aring;da proffesionelt tr&auml;nade stuntm&auml;n i Sverige. Innan den h&auml;r filmen har jag jobbat med Erik tv&aring; g&aring;nger och en efter p&aring; andra personers filmer som koregraf eller "slagp&aring;se".

Jag &auml;lskar feedback och f&ouml;rslag f&ouml;r kommande produktioner s&aring; kom g&auml;rna med dem om ni har n&aring;gra. Just nu s&aring; arbetar jag f&ouml;r n&auml;sta actionfilm med Erik och Tim som kommer inneh&aring;lla Parkour(stadsakrobatik), kampart, magi/visuella effekter och ja en dialogdriven historia.

http://www.amatorfilm.se/kvinna.htm
